sentences.en: Assume that atmosphere is made of diatom ideal gas in adiabatic equilibrium.
sentences.cn: 大气可看成绝热平衡下的双原子理想气体.

sentences.en: Blue algae, green algae and diatom are dominant algaes in the Dian chi lake.
sentences.cn: 蓝藻 、 绿藻和硅藻是滇池的优势藻种.

sentences.en: Called Thalassiosira trifulta, the diatom was discovered as part of an ongoing project to catalog animal diversity on the Korean Peninsula (map).
sentences.cn: 这种属于海链藻属的硅藻是在科学家们在朝鲜半岛调查当地的动物多样性的时候被发现的。

sentences.en: It may lie in the shell of a single-celled, 100-million-year-old life form called a diatom.
sentences.cn: 就在一种拥有一亿年历史，称之为硅藻的单细胞植物的外壳里。

sentences.en: The colorful effect is due to the diatom's silica cell wall, which encases the organism like a glassy shell.
sentences.cn: 它的五颜六色效果是由于硅藻的像玻璃外壳包围着机体的二氧化硅细胞壁。

sentences.en: The food composition consisted of eight groups: diatom, protozoa, spongiaria, annelida, mollusca, crustacea, echinodermata and pisces.
sentences.cn: 其食物组成有8大类: 硅藻类 、 原生动物 、 海绵动物 、 环节动物 、 软体动物 、 甲壳动物 、 棘皮动物及鱼类.

sentences.en: The process conditions of separation and purification via diatom earth filtration and alcohol precipitation were studied.
sentences.cn: 醇析法是一种有效分离提纯黄原胶的方法.

trans.tran_en: any microscopic unicellular alga of the phylum Bacillariophyta, occurring in marine or fresh water singly or in colonies, each cell having a cell wall made of two halves and impregnated with silica
